DataElement.preferredName: Patient Known Human Immunodeficiency Virus And Inadequate CD4 Expressing Cell Count Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response that indicates a patient has known HIV and has inadequate CD4 cell count that meets the eligibility criteria for enrollment into a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Known Human Immunodeficiency Virus And Inadequate CD4 Expressing Cell Count Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement._The determination of the amount of the CD4 expressing cells in a sample._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Known Human Immunodeficiency Virus And Inadequate CD4 Expressing Cell Count Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.:Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.:The determination of the amount of the CD4 expressing cells in a sample.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.
The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.
The determination of the amount of the CD4 expressing cells in a sample.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has known HIV infe
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has known HIV infection, is CD4 count inadequate (less than 500)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is HIV-positive is CD4 count less than 200?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is HIV positive and on combination antiretroviral therapy, is CD4+ count below the institutional lower limit of normal?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is HIV-positive is CD4 count less than 350 cells/mm3 with an undetectable viral load?
